Today, Dan and Jordan jump back into their investigation of Alex Jones' behavior after the [[The Sandy Hook Elementary Massacre|Sandy Hook]] mass shooting. The gents find a man in a bit of a conspiracy holding pattern, but some signs of things to come pop up.

==Tidbits==

*Hot sauce report: Hydra is too much, Trinidad scorpion pepper is just right
*Being a winner is deceiving people
*Alex says official story is a fable
*Caller says police used to stop and frisk when he was young, it's evolved into seizure
*Alex says New York Stop & Frisk is an intro to martial law, ignores that S&F was targeting minorities
*Dark Knight was programming
*Sandy Hook on Gotham map
*globalists sent out Bane themed attack commands
*[[Adam Lanza]] only had 2 handguns, no bushmaster (completely wrong)
*Alex conflates school closing early with Mayan Apocalypse
*Alex doesn't believe in the Mayan Apocalypse
*Alex takes a lot of calls
*Caller suggests Jan Morgan as a guest, she's a shit-show gun range owner who can get fucked
*Bob Barr of the NRA interview
*Barr almost shot when receiving antique gun as gift
*Pentagon developed FPS games to get people to kill
*China calls for disarming American citizens (not)
*Alex claims InfoWars broke story on China, it was actually Breitbart
*Pravda credits InfoWars with breaking the China story
*FEMA camp rant
*globalists are willing to nuke a city to discredit Alex
*Alex recommends citizens getting active to combat tyranny
*[[David Icke]] says we're heading for the Hunger Games
*[[Susan Collins]] lived in Sandy Hook (along with lots of people)
*Icke equates Sandy Hook false flag to Nazis
*Sandy Hook was a false flag to induce emotional trauma for psychic vampires
*Dan walks back earlier soft support of Icke
